items.name: Stick
items.description: It's brown, and thicker than most sticks. More like a branch.

items.name: Note
items.description: A small piece of paper with writing on it.

items.name: Sword
items.description: Shiny, sharp, sleek, set to separate souls from bodies.

items.name: password or item
items.attribute: allows you to identify the good wizard

items.name: Knife
items.description: Great for dicing vegetables or carving a turkey.

items.name: Poison
items.description: The purple concoction boils and broths. A wisp of smoke snakes upwards from the vial.

items.name: Wizard Robes
items.description: They are purple and dotted with little stars.
